# Building an R Package
[![Build Status](https://api.travis-ci.org/jr-packages/jrPackage.png?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/jr-packages/jrPackage)

This is a teaching package created and used by [Jumping Rivers](https://www.jumpingrivers.com). To install the package run the following commands

```{r eval=FALSE}
install.packages("drat")
drat::addRepo("jr-packages")
install.packages("jrPackage")
```
